name: Retro Tank Fighting
description:
Get ready for an exciting retro tank fighting game! Battle against four different types of AI opponents, each with their own unique abilities and challenges:

  • The Blue Dumb Fire Tank only know how to shoot.
  • The Yellow Homing Missile Tank fires projectiles that follow the player's tank.
  • The Brown Multiple Shots Tank uses multiple bullets to try and overwhelm the player's tank.
  • The Red Tracking Tank is the most dangerous AI tank, capable of tracking the player's movements and following them.

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Rctrl or Left Mouse Button to fire. 

It took a month to develop this game, and the attention to detail is evident in the polished graphics and smooth gameplay. With a variety of different AI tanks to battle against, each with their own unique abilities and challenges, you will find yourself engaged and entertained for hours on end. So, get ready to jump into your tank and battle your way to victory in this exciting retro tank fighting game!
